sentence.Network_en: Don't keep squab bring with me . I'm sick of you!

sentence.Network_en: Bob Shipley says exporting smoked squab would not be a solution either.

sentence.Network_en: In the smoking process, squab ( squab ) meat becomes very soft, almost like paste.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'inexperienced person'): of unknown origin; compare with obsolete quab 'shapeless thing' and Swedish dialect skvabba 'fat woman'
